meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7284.

div.div:
Andrew Pau game 5.
WE ASKED: Designer Cynthia Rowley.

td.p: Jonpaul Guinn, a quiz host and writer from Providence, Rhode Island
Beth Dunn, a product demonstrator from Brooklyn, New York
Andrew Pau, an assistant professor from Amherst, Ohio (whose 4-day cash winnings total $123,802)

tr.td: WOMEN, IMMORTALIZED
POPULAR WEBSITES
REALITY TV JUDGES
AROUND THE WORLD
YOU NEED FOOD TO GROW ON
SHORT "E"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Beth: What is the Statue of Liberty?)
...
(Alex: Yes, with a short "E".)
(Andrew: [Laughs] Oh.)

Eleanor Roosevelt

AndrewBeth
')

tr.td: Andrew
Beth
Jonpaul
LITERARY NEW YORK CITY
HYPHENATED TERMS
MOVIES' VILLAINS
(Alex: We'll give you the [*], you give me the movie's title.)
PAST TENSES
NEW WORLD EXPLORATION
BONE"S"
(Alex: But each correct response will not end with an "S". It'll begin with the letter "S".)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
